dmca.title: [EV1-C1614818B] Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, October 31, 2006 11:10 AM Posted To: DMCA Conversation: [EV1-C1614818B] Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Subject: [EV1-C1614818B] Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 31 2006 05:07 pm X-MailFrom: Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.101] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Oct 31 17:07:26 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A0000076C; Tue, 31 Oct 2006 17:06:13 -0600 Received: from mx04.filter.theplanet.com [207.218.221.230] by mail.ev1.net with ESMTP (SMTPD32-6.06) id A6E04FE00066; Tue, 31 Oct 2006 17:06:11 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 31 Oct 2006 17:07:24 -0600 Received: from keys.mpaa.org ([66.252.128.54]) by mx04.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org) with esmtp (Exim) id 1Gf2hY-000B67-8z; Tue, 31 Oct 2006 17:07:24 -0600 Received: from keys.mpaa.org (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by keys.mpaa.org (PGP Universal) with ESMTP id 874732F3680; Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:06:42 -0800 (PST) Received: from mailgate.mpaa.org ([192.168.90.25]) by keys.mpaa.org (PGP Universal service); Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:06:42 -0800 X-PGP-Universal: processed; by keys.mpaa.org on Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:06:42 -0800 Received: from LAMAIL2.mpaa.org ([192.168.100.241]) by mailgate.mpaa.org with Microsoft SMTPSVC(5.0.2195.7035); Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:06:42 -0800 Content-class: urn:content-classes:message MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----_=_NextPart_001_01C6FD41.3A365250" X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft Exchange V6.5 Subject: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Date: Tue, 31 Oct 2006 15:06:41 -0800 Message-ID: X-MS-Has-Attach: X-MS-TNEF-Correlator: Thread-Topic: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Thread-Index: Acb9QTnVwuCze9y3QhuaSwRv+G/QbQ== From: To: , X-OriginalArrivalTime: 31 Oct 2006 23:06:42.0308 (UTC) FILETIME=[3A842C40:01C6FD41] X-Declude-Sender: Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org [207.218.221.230] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from mx04.filter.theplanet.com ([207.218.221.230]). (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) MOTION PICTURE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, INC. 15503 VENTURA BOULEVARD ENCINO, CALIFORNIA 91436 UNITED STATES Anti-Piracy Operations Email: antipiracy@copyright.org October 31, 2006 Name: General Counsel ISP: Everyones Internet Via Fax/Email RE: Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures Reference#: Everyones Internet-10009 (M) IP Address: 67.15.39.155, (http://www.bestboxsets.com ) Date of Infringement: October 31, 2006 Dear General Counsel: The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies: Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc. Disney Enterprises, Inc. Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc. Paramount Pictures Corporation TriStar Pictures, Inc. Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation United Artists Pictures, Inc. United Artists Corporation Universal City Studios, LLLP Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc. We have received information that, on the above noted date, the IP address 67.15.39.155 (http://www.bestboxsets.com ) was used to sell or to materially contribute to the selling of DVD copies of copyrighted motion pictures. The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to: 24 (Seasons 1-4) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.html Ally McBeal (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.5.html Alias (Seasons 1-4) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.22.html Angel (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.58.html Babylon 5 (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.15.html Buffy the Vampire Slayer (Seasons 1-7) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.25.html C.S.I. (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.11.html E.R. (Seasons 1-8) http://www.bestboxsets.com/catalog.97.html Everybody Loves Raymond (Seasons 1-6) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.44.html Friends (Seasons 1-10) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.51.html Gilmore Girls (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/catalog.72.html We believe this information should prove sufficient for you to locate the material complained about herein; however, please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or clarification requests you may have. The unauthorized distribution or public performance of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations. As the owner of this IP address, we request that you immediately do the following: 1. Notify the end user of the infringement(s). 2. Remove or disable access to the material identified above. 3. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement. On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law. Also pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification. Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions. Kindly include the above noted Reference # in the subject line of all email correspondence. We thank you for your cooperation in this matter. Your prompt response is requested. Respectfully, Motion Picture Association of America Richard Rosner U.S. Anti-Piracy Internet Enforcement Motion Picture Association Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org 818-995-6600 x 325 MIME element (text/html)

MOTION PICTURE ASSOCIATION OF AMERICA, INC.

15503 VENTURA BOULEVARD

ENCINO, CALIFORNIA 91436

UNITED STATES

 

Anti-Piracy Operations

Email: antipiracy@copyright.org <mailto:antipiracy@copyright.org>

 

October 31, 2006

 

Name:   General Counsel

 

ISP:     
Everyones
Internet

 

Via Fax/Email

 

RE:        &n bsp;           &n bsp;           &n bsp;          Unauthorized Use of Copyrighted Motion Pictures

Reference#:      
       Everyones
Internet-10009 (M)

IP Address:          &nbs p;           &nbs p;        67.15.39.155, (http://www.bestboxsets.com)< /o:p>

Date of Infringement:                   October 31, 2006

 

Dear General Counsel:

 

The Motion Picture Association of America (MPAA) represents the following motion picture production and distribution companies:

 

Columbia Pictures Industries, Inc.

Disney Enterprises, Inc.

Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer Studios Inc.

Paramount Pictures Corporation

TriStar Pictures, Inc.

Twentieth Century Fox Film Corporation

United Artists Pictures, Inc.

United Artists Corporation

Universal City Studios, LLLP

Warner Bros. Entertainment Inc.

 

We have received information that, on the above noted date, the IP address 67.15.39.155 (http://www.bestboxsets.com) was used to sell or to materially contribute to the selling of DVD copies of copyrighted motion pictures.  The title(s) offered included, but were not limited to:

 

24 (Seasons 1-4) http://bestboxsets.com/catalo g.html

Ally McBeal (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/cata log.5.html

Alias (Seasons 1-4) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.22.html

Angel (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.58.html

Babylon 5 (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.15.html

Buffy the Vampire Slayer (Seasons 1-7) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.25.html

C.S.I. (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.11.html

E.R. (Seasons 1-8) http://www.bestboxsets .com/catalog.97.html

Everybody Loves Raymond (Seasons 1-6) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.44.html

Friends (Seasons 1-10) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.51.html

Gilmore Girls (Seasons 1-5) http://bestboxsets.com/cat alog.72.html

 

 

We believe this information should prove sufficient for you to locate the material complained about herein; however, please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions or clarification requests you may have.

 

The unauthorized distribution or public performance of copyrighted motion pictures constitutes copyright infringement under the Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 106(3)-(4). This conduct may also violate the laws of other countries, international law, and/or treaty obligations.

 

As the owner of this IP address, we request that you immediately do the following:

 

1. Notify the end user of the infringement(s).

2. Remove or disable access to the material identified above.

3. Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse Policy/Terms of Service Agreement.

 

On behalf of the respective owners of the exclusive rights to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice, we hereby state, pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, Title 17 United States Code Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that we have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owners, their respective agents, or the law.

 

Also pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, we hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that we are authorized to act on behalf of the owners of the exclusive rights being infringed as set forth in this notification.

 

Please contact us at the above listed address or by replying to this email should you have any questions.  Kindly include the above noted Reference # in the subject line of all email correspondence.

 

We thank you for your cooperation in this matter.  Your prompt response is requested.

 

Respectfully,

 

Motion Picture Association of America

 

 

Richard Rosner

U.S. Anti-Piracy Internet Enforcement

Motion Picture Association

Richard_Rosner@mpaa.org

818-995-6600 x 325
